questions.question: Has the user completed at least 3 ride-sharing trips in the last 30 days?
Is there at least one recorded food delivery order within the past 14 days?
questions.criteria: Checks for recent food delivery usage

questions.question: Has the user made 2 or more grocery shopping transactions in the last 30 days?
Does the user have a single preferred ride-sharing provider with at least 2 rides in the last 30 days?
Has the user ordered food delivery on at least two separate days within the same recurring time window in the last 30 days?
questions.criteria: Evaluates consistency in food ordering habits

questions.question: Are there at least 3 distinct service categories with recorded usage in the past 30 days?
questions.criteria: Measures diversity and quality of service usage data
